about_the_game:
A casually competitive two player game set in medieval times. Go head to head with friends to see who can collect their feast or claim the land first, while battling each other with swords.

Grab a friend, sit back, and enjoy some friendly 2v2 fun in this 2D retro style, pixelated medieval world.

Perfect your sword timing

Stop your opponent from collecting their feast by hitting them with your sword, or defend yourself by anticipating your opponents attacks and striking back.

Claim your land

Swap all of the banners in the level to display your sigil and show your opponent that this land is yours.

Lots of levels

Every level has a different layout so precise platforming is key to beating your opponent.

Several squires and banners to choose

With lots of varying colors and designs, choose the squire and banner combo that represents you best.
